resources = ResourceTestRule.builder()
            .addResource(new DocumentResource(getQueryStore(), new TableTranslator(new SegregationConfiguration())))
            .addProvider(new FoxtrotExceptionMapper(getMapper()))
            .setMapper(objectMapper)
            .build()
